title: Bug 5475F4 causes loss of context when called from a method view
description: You have to find and select the methodagain.
OB: Bug 5475F4 causes loss of context when called from a method view The method focus was lost.
SR: Bug 5475F4 causes loss of context when called from a method view 1) Open a class with many methods2) Make sure "show of source element only" is selected3) Choose a method4) Press F4 with no selectionThe class is open on the hierarchy view and the full source is shown in theeditor.
